Ogblin.name: Ogblin
Ogblin.title: Mutophile
Ogblin.description: While the Children of Og are widespread across the world and highly varied in what mutations they have, a large enough group always seems to have Ogblins among their number. Stunted creatures with green skin, they are too uniform in their appearance to not be a heritage, yet they seem to arise almost spontaneously. Where do they come from?

Verdant.name: Verdant
Verdant.title: Green Thumb
Verdant.description: One strange phenomenon born out of Mana Corruption is a convergent evolution, where some plants have started taking on humanoid forms and wandered out to reduce their Mana Exposure. Many of these plantfolk have integrated into society.

Dust Stalker.name: Dust Stalker
Dust Stalker.title: Wanderer
Dust Stalker.description: Folk with catlike features who have taken to wandering the deserts between towns, many have turned to banditry.

Latchkey Islander.name: Latchkey Islander
Latchkey Islander.title: Seaborn
Latchkey Islander.description: Many folk of the Latchkey Isles have developed fins that allow them to swim well even off a ship. Their distinctive fins and propensity for piracy have given them a poor reputation in other lands.
